mapper.insert: INSERT INTO simsns.like (userEmailHost, postNo, postTimestamp, commentNo, commentTimestamp, likeNo, likeTimestamp, userEmailGuest, commentDepth) VALUES ( #{userEmailHost}, #{postNo}, #{postTimestamp}, #{commentNo}, #{commentTimestamp}, #{likeNo}, #{likeTimestamp}, #{userEmailGuest}, #{commentDepth})
mapper.select: SELECT userEmailHost, postNo, postTimestamp, commentNo, commentTimestamp, likeNo, likeTimestamp, userEmailGuest, commentDepth FROM simsns.like WHERE userEmailHost = #{userEmail} ORDER BY postTimestamp DESC, postNo DESC, commentDepth ASC, commentTimestamp ASC, commentNo ASC, likeTimestamp ASC, likeNo ASC
